help.value:
You can evaluate just code and have the result shown below the text box:

echo HABARI_PATH;
echo "foobar";

Or, you can add filters, actions, theme functions, xmlrpc functions. For example to filter post title:

filter_post_title {
	function foo($a) {
		return $a . " BOOOO!";
	}

	function boo($a) {
		return $a . " FOOOO!";
	}
}

Or an action:

action_init {
	function foo($a) {
		echo "PONIES!";
	}
}
